description: By investing in a globally diversified portfolio of ETFs with a target allocation of approximately 60% equity and 40% fixed income, HBAL is designed for investors looking for capital growth and a moderate income. HBAL offers investors a straightforward way to achieve diversified exposure to fixed income and equity securities, simplifying the process of building an entire portfolio, that is continuously monitored and automatically rebalanced, in one convenient package. Designed to deliver consistent income on a monthly basis. HBAL seeks to provide a combination of long-term capital growth and a moderate level of income, primarily by investing in exchange traded funds that provide exposure to a globally diversified portfolio of equity and fixed income securities.
name: Global X Balanced Asset Allocation ETF
